hero.label: Lean Certifications
hero.title: Build Real Improvement Capability
hero.description: Certification programs that develop practical skills. Your team learns by solving real problems, not studying for tests.

intro.title: Two Paths to Lean Expertise
intro.description: Whether you need foundational skills or advanced project leadership, we have a program that fits. Both certifications focus on practical application in your organization.

practitioner.label: Foundation Level
practitioner.title: Lean Practitioner
practitioner.description: Foundation-level training for anyone involved in improvement work. Learn to see waste, understand flow, and contribute to problem-solving efforts.
idealFor: Team members participating in improvement projects
Support staff in quality, maintenance, or logistics
outcomes: Map simple processes and identify improvement opportunities
Apply 5S principles to your work area
Understand the foundation of continuous improvement

format.title: How It Works
points: 2 days of hands-on training
Mix of instruction and practical exercises
Apply concepts to your actual work environment
Certification upon completion

sixSigma.label: Advanced Level
sixSigma.title: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
sixSigma.description: Project leadership skills for those who will lead improvement initiatives. Learn to scope projects, lead teams, analyze data, and sustain results.
outcomes: Use data analysis to identify root causes
Implement control systems that sustain gains

format.title: How It Works
points: 8 days of training spread over several weeks
Complete a real improvement project in your organization
Receive coaching support throughout the project
Present results and demonstrate measurable impact
Certification upon successful project completion

practitioner.title: Choose Lean Practitioner if:
points: You're new to lean concepts
You participate in but don't lead projects
You want foundational skills quickly
You need a common language for your team

sixSigma.title: Choose Lean Six Sigma if:
points: You'll lead improvement projects
You need advanced analytical skills
You want to coach and develop others
You're building a formal improvement program

whyOurs.title: Why Our Certifications Are Different
points: Real projects, not case studies. You work on actual problems in your organization.
Coaching included. You get support between sessions to apply what you learn.
Practical focus. Every tool we teach has been proven in real organizations.
Flexible delivery. In-person, virtual, or hybrid to fit how your team works.
